description: An open-source open-world RPG game engine that supports playing Morrowind. (nightly version)
notes: Please run the OpenMW Launcher in the start menu to configure the game data path. Otherwise, OpenMW won't start correctly.

checkver.useragent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/137.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
script: 'User-Agent' = 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/137.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'

"query": "query getJobs($fullPath: ID!, $first: Int, $last: Int, $after: String, $before: String, $statuses: [CiJobStatus!], $sources: [CiJobSource!], $name: String) {
  project(fullPath: $fullPath) {
    id
    jobs(
      first: $first
      last: $last
      after: $after
      before: $before
      statuses: $statuses
      sources: $sources
      name: $name
    ) {
      pageInfo {
        endCursor
        hasNextPage
        hasPreviousPage
        startCursor
        __typename
      }
      nodes {
        artifacts {
          nodes {
            downloadPath
            fileType
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        allowFailure
        status
        scheduledAt
        manualJob
        triggered
        createdByTag
        detailedStatus {
          id
          detailsPath
          group
          icon
          label
          text
          tooltip
          action {
            id
            buttonTitle
            icon
            method
            path
            title
            confirmationMessage
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        id
        refName
        refPath
        tags
        shortSha
        commitPath
        pipeline {
          id
          path
          user {
            id
            webPath
            avatarUrl
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        stage {
          id
          name
          __typename
        }
        name
        duration
        finishedAt
        coverage
        retryable
        playable
        cancelable
        active
        stuck
        userPermissions {
          readBuild
          readJobArtifacts
          updateBuild
          cancelBuild
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"
